name: Minecraft 1.18.0
description:
------------------------{Controls}----------------------------

- Use arrow keys or w,a,s,d to move.

- Click to break, place or eat.

- Press P to pause/save the game

- Press E to open inventory/interact with stuff.

- Press / to open the command line.

- Press Space to drop 1 item from a stack in the inventory.

- Hold Space and Click to split a stack in the inventory.

----------------------------{Minecraft}---------------------------

Version: 1.18

Blocks: 334

*Game Discontinued*

--------------------------------[Credits]---------------------------

Credits go to Mojang/Microsoft for Blocks

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

There are many Biomes , Its Like Advanced Version of Paper Minecraft

This game was originally created in Scratch But I wanted my Game to

be on Other Websites so I Published Here Too!
